name: Verify user is able to add Supplementary Vaccine

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to add Supplementary Vaccine ({Vaccine Name=bOPV, Producer=Sinovac Life Sciences Co. Ltd., Formulation=Liquid: ready to use, No. Of Rounds=10, Presentation=20, Wastage Rates(%)=10, Administration Type=ADS_0.05ml, Dilution-Syringes=ADS_0.1ml})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
Click login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
Then User login as "Country Admin"
User login: Country Admin
And User select "Country Admin" from "Role" in "Welcome" tab
Select value from dropdown: Country Admin, Role
Wait for time: 2
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
And User click on "Programme Data" tab
Click on tab: Programme Data
And User wait for "2" seconds
Wait for time: 2
Given User click on "Add Supplementary Vaccine" button for "Programme Data"
Click on button programme data: Add Supplementary Vaccine
And "Add new supplementary vaccination" heading is visible
Validate is heading visible: Add new supplementary vaccination
And User select "bOPV" from "Vaccine Name" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: bOPV, Vaccine Name
And User select "Sinovac Life Sciences Co. Ltd." from "Producer" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: Sinovac Life Sciences Co. Ltd., Producer
And User select "Liquid: ready to use" from "Formulation" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: Liquid: ready to use, Formulation
And User enter "10" in "noOfRounds"
Enter text in textbox: 10, noOfRounds
And User select "20" from "Presentation" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: 20, Presentation
And User enter "10" in "wastageRates"
Enter text in textbox: 10, wastageRates
And User select "ADS_0.05ml" from "Administration Type" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: ADS_0.05ml, Administration Type
And User select "ADS_0.1ml" from "Dilution-Syringes" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: ADS_0.1ml, Dilution-Syringes
When User click on "Save" button
Click on button: Save
Then Supplementary Vaccine Data is created successfully
Validate created message displayed
And User wait for "10" seconds
Wait for time: 10
And Supplementary Vaccine producer "Sinovac Life Sciences Co. Ltd." is visible in Supplementary Vaccination table to user

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Add Supplementary Vaccine" button for "Programme Data"
And "Add new supplementary vaccination" heading is visible
And User select "<Vaccine Name>" from "Vaccine Name" in "Programme Data" tab
And User select "<Producer>" from "Producer" in "Programme Data" tab
And User select "<Formulation>" from "Formulation" in "Programme Data" tab
And User enter "<No. Of Rounds>" in "noOfRounds"
And User select "<Presentation>" from "Presentation" in "Programme Data" tab
And User enter "<Wastage Rates(%)>" in "wastageRates"
And User select "<Administration Type>" from "Administration Type" in "Programme Data" tab
And User select "<Dilution-Syringes>" from "Dilution-Syringes" in "Programme Data" tab
When User click on "Save" button
Then Supplementary Vaccine Data is created successfully
And User wait for "10" seconds
And Supplementary Vaccine producer "<Producer>" is visible in Supplementary Vaccination table to user
